HyreCar | Nasdaq symbol: HYRE | Senior Software Engineers | Javascript, React, GraphQL, Apollo, Docker | Los Angeles, CA | Full-time, ONSITE | $100k - $150k + Equity

I am Abhi, CTO of HyreCar, now a publicly listed company. We are an open platform that connects extra cars with drivers who need a car to drive for Uber/Lyft etc. Our platform helps thousands of drivers every day nation wide. We are growing rapidly and need engineers who want to help us scale 10 times.
